name: part_007
file: tmp_Yozora Mel stream (Dec 19, 2021)【3DLIVE】メルキス3周年LIVE♡Xmas Party【#メルキス３周年ライブ】 [6J010KA__RQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Yozora Mel performs 'Hokoritakaki Idol' by HoneyWorks.
Mel-Kiss (Yozora Mel and Yuzuki Choco) performs 'Kimiiro Signal'.

subtitles.original: 性格とか
subtitles.english: As for my personality...

subtitles.original: 悪いほうです 騙しちゃっていますか？
subtitles.english: ...it's on the bad side. Have I deceived you?

subtitles.original: でも本気です 本気なんです
subtitles.english: But I'm serious, I'm really serious.

subtitles.original: ありのままの私を
subtitles.english: About the real me...

subtitles.original: 好きになって 推してください
subtitles.english: ...please love and support me.

subtitles.original: それってわがままですか？
subtitles.english: Is that selfish of me?

subtitles.original: きっと可愛くない
subtitles.english: I'm surely not cute.

subtitles.original: 全部分かってる
subtitles.english: I know all of it.

subtitles.original: それでも好かれてたい
subtitles.english: But I still want to be loved.

subtitles.original: アイドルだから
subtitles.english: Because I'm an idol.

subtitles.original: 低い奴は嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate those who look down on others.

subtitles.original: 言い訳ばかりも嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I also hate those who just make excuses.

subtitles.original: こんなもんかという言葉を
subtitles.english: Words like "is this all you've got?"

subtitles.original: 軽々しく口にするな
subtitles.english: Don't say them so lightly.

subtitles.original: 勝手に限界決めるな
subtitles.english: Don't decide the limit on your own.

subtitles.original: 笑いものになんてするな
subtitles.english: Don't make me a laughingstock.

subtitles.original: アイドルなんとかという言葉は
subtitles.english: The word "idol" or whatever...

subtitles.original: この世で一番大嫌いだ
subtitles.english: ...I hate it the most in this world.

subtitles.original: 強い強い心に誓え
subtitles.english: Vow to your strong, strong heart.

subtitles.original: 誇り高きアイドル
subtitles.english: A proud idol.

subtitles.original: 目指そうぜ
subtitles.english: Let's aim for it!

subtitles.original: 応援がなければ活動できない
subtitles.english: I can't work without your support.

subtitles.original: 好きなことばかりじゃ生きてはいけない
subtitles.english: I can't live just by doing what I like.

subtitles.original: 元気あげるはずが
subtitles.english: I'm supposed to give you energy...

subtitles.original: もらってばかりだし 恩返しできる日まで待ってて
subtitles.english: ...but I'm only receiving it. Wait for the day I can repay you.

subtitles.original: 歓声が減っても
subtitles.english: Even if the cheers decrease...

subtitles.original: 飽きられちゃっても
subtitles.english: ...even if you get tired of me...

subtitles.original: それでも笑っていたい
subtitles.english: ...I still want to be smiling.

subtitles.original: アイドルだから
subtitles.english: Because I'm an idol.

subtitles.original: 厚いファンの愛があって
subtitles.english: There is the thick love of fans,

subtitles.original: スタッフさんの愛があって
subtitles.english: there is the love of staff members,

subtitles.original: いつも家族の愛があって
subtitles.english: there is always the love of family...

subtitles.original: 生きてる
subtitles.english: ...and I'm living.

subtitles.original: アイドル
subtitles.english: Idol.

subtitles.original: 馬鹿にする奴は嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate those who make fun of us.

subtitles.original: 見下されるのも嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I also hate being looked down upon.

subtitles.original: アイドルなんとかという言葉を
subtitles.english: The word "idol" or whatever...

subtitles.original: 見てもいないくせに言うな
subtitles.english: ...don't say it when you haven't even seen us.

subtitles.original: 頑張りもせずというな
subtitles.english: Don't say we're not working hard.

subtitles.original: イメージとか強制するな
subtitles.english: Don't force images on us.

subtitles.original: アイドルなんとかという言葉は
subtitles.english: The word "idol" or whatever...

subtitles.original: この世で一番大嫌いだ
subtitles.english: ...I hate it the most in this world.

subtitles.original: 君色シグナル / Covered by メルキス
subtitles.english: Kimiiro Signal / Covered by Mel-Kiss

subtitles.original: 放課後 二人で過ごした教室
subtitles.english: The classroom where we spent time together after school.

subtitles.original: 机の上 夢中で弾む君の声
subtitles.english: Your voice bouncing excitedly above the desk.

subtitles.original: 鈍感な君のその態度が
subtitles.english: That attitude of yours, so insensitive...

subtitles.original: いつも私を
subtitles.english: ...it always makes me...

subtitles.original: 意地悪にさせるの
subtitles.english: ...act mean.

subtitles.original: ひとりぼっちだと思う時もある
subtitles.english: There are times when I think I'm all alone.

subtitles.original: 涙止められない日もある
subtitles.english: There are days when I can't stop the tears.

subtitles.original: 本当の私を
subtitles.english: I want you to...

subtitles.original: 見つめてほしいの
subtitles.english: ...look at the real me.

subtitles.original: きっと伝わると信じているよ
subtitles.english: I believe it will surely reach you.

subtitles.original: 君はいつだっていつだって変わらないから
subtitles.english: Because you never, ever change...

subtitles.original: 君はいつだっていつだって変わらないから
subtitles.english: Because you never, ever change...

subtitles.original: 私が何回も何回も
subtitles.english: ...I'll send you signals...

subtitles.original: 私が何回も何回も
subtitles.english: ...I'll send you signals...

subtitles.original: シグナル送ってあげる
subtitles.english: ...over and over again.

subtitles.original: シグナル送ってあげる
subtitles.english: ...over and over again.

subtitles.original: 夢見たあの場所目指して
subtitles.english: Aiming for that place I dreamed of...

subtitles.original: くじけそうな時も
subtitles.english: ...even when I'm about to give up...

subtitles.original: 頑張れそうだよ
subtitles.english: ...I feel like I can do my best...

subtitles.original: 君がいるから
subtitles.english: ...because you are here.

subtitles.original: 二人歩くいつもの帰り道
subtitles.english: The usual way home where the two of us walk.

subtitles.original: 名前がない気持ちが芽生え始めてる
subtitles.english: Feelings without a name are starting to sprout.

subtitles.original: だけど踏み出すための
subtitles.english: But the courage to...

subtitles.original: 勇気は
subtitles.english: ...take a step forward...

subtitles.original: 少しだけまだ遠くにありそう
subtitles.english: ...still seems to be a little bit far away.

subtitles.original: 何も持っていなかった
subtitles.english: To me, who had nothing...

subtitles.original: 何も持っていなかった
subtitles.english: To me, who had nothing...

subtitles.original: 私に
私に
君がくれた心の鍵は
subtitles.english: ...the key to my heart that you gave me...

subtitles.original: 君がくれた心の鍵は
subtitles.english: ...the key to my heart that you gave me...
